code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{fetchAsyncMoviesbyID}from"../features/movieSlice";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Moviedetails=function Moviedetails(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var id=useSelector(function(state){return state.movies.id;});var single=useSelector(function(state){return state.movies.singleMovie;});console.log(single);var localval=localStorage.getItem("id");useEffect(function(){id?dispatch(fetchAsyncMoviesbyID(id)):dispatch(fetchAsyncMoviesbyID(localval));id?localStorage.setItem("id",id):localStorage.setItem("id",localval);},[id]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"single-poster",src:single.Poster,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"align",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{className:"mar-1",children:["Title : ",single.Title]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h5",{className:"mar-1",children:["Awards : ",single.Awards]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mar-1",children:single.Actors}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mar-1 rating",children:["IMDB Ratings : ",single.imdbRating]})]})})]});};export default Moviedetails;
